title: Add support for non-verifiable SSL certificates
message:
Add support for non-verifiable SSL certificates

This includes expired certificates, self-signed certificates, and pretty
much everything else. White-listing is done based on the SHA1 hash.

title: Fix preview of configured SSL cert name override
message: Fix preview of configured SSL cert name override

title: Add support for accepting SSL certificates with incorrect hostnames
message:
Add support for accepting SSL certificates with incorrect hostnames

Still requires the cert to chain up to a proper root - allowing selfsigned certs
and other broken certs (expired ones, for example) is for a future commit...

title: Fix settings editor refresh on overwriting imported entries
message: Fix settings editor refresh on overwriting imported entries

title: Show complete error message when lists fail to load
message:
Show complete error message when lists fail to load

click on the list to view the details. Useful for tracking down SSL errors

title: Create new instances of strings, and truncate length of message contents
message:
Create new instances of strings, and truncate length of message contents

This should drastically reduce memory consumption.

The new strings need to be created because the groups matched from regexps are
just pointers into the original string, meaning we left the whole old HTML string
around forever...

title: Allow completely empty subjects when moderating Mailman lists
message:
Allow completely empty subjects when moderating Mailman lists

Some list servers seem to make it completely blank whereas some put
"(No subject)". With this change, both are supported.

Per report from Dave Paul

message:
Don't drop back out to the main screen when adding or deleting a server

Instead, stay in settings and reload the list.
Turned out to be a lot easier than I originally thought...

message: Include messages with no subject (not subject == "No Subject")

title: Size progress bar by number of messages to moderate.
message:
Size progress bar by number of messages to moderate.

Sizing by total number of messages is only correct if all messages
are moderated at once.

title: Include message subject when viewing message details
message: Include message subject when viewing message details

title: Make the progress bar during moderation more correct.
message:
Make the progress bar during moderation more correct.

* Start at message 1, not 0.
* Include the reloading queue as part of the steps, increasing the number by 1.
* Don't convert to percent - android does that for us. Instead use the proper counter,
  making the display a lot nicer.

title: Match on emails that don't have a plaintext part (such as those having only
message:
Match on emails that don't have a plaintext part (such as those having only
text/html). Since majordomo won't decode that and put it on the main page,
we have to call out to a yet another page to get the contents.

title: Typo fix
message: Typo fix

title: Only match held posts, and not things like subscription attempts. This
message:
Only match held posts, and not things like subscription attempts. This
avoids calling out to the subpage for every queued non-post.

(If we want to do subscriptions in the future, that'll be a different regexp)

title: The trick with setResult(2) doesn't seem to work (doesn't refresh the list of
message:
The trick with setResult(2) doesn't seem to work (doesn't refresh the list of
preferences), so just do away with that for now.

Also remove the cancel button since it closed the whole preferences thing -
you can just click the regular back/cancel button on the device instead..
